com.safety4kids.game.Screens

Class IntroAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.safety4kids.game.Screens.IntroAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class IntroAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Creates an instance of SplashScreenLogo and alter's it's alpha and x-position to draw a splash screen.

    Course info:

    ICS4U with V. Krasteva
    Author:
    Bill Bai, Erfan Yeganehfar

        This is the TextureAtlas for the second level. It is loaded in the splash screen to save time when switching to level 2.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntroAnimation

        public IntroAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.Game aGame)
        This is the constructor. It initiates the global variables and loads level2 questions, which saves time when level2 is loading.
        Parameters:
        aGame - The Game that is currently being drawn on.

        public void render(float delta)
        This is the render method. It draws the logo on the screen while shifting it's alpha and x-location.
        Specified by:

      • loadLevel2Questions

        private void loadLevel2Questions()
        This method loads the second level Lists: questions, answers, and questionHelp. It initializes those Lists, so that they can be returned. It implements FileIO. It reads from two files, stores the Strings into it's respected Lists, then uses a sequential search to find the answer of each question.

      • getBatch

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch getBatch()

        Returns:
        batch.
